mapper.select: select t1.id , t1.interface_no , t1.params_name , t1.params_code , t1.parent_params , t1.validate_state , t1.create_time , t1.create_by , t1.modify_time , t1.modify_by from ext_interface_params_ref t1 where t1.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update ext_interface_params_ref t1 set t1.interface_no =#{dto.interfaceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.params_name =#{dto.paramsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.params_code =#{dto.paramsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.parent_params =#{dto.parentParams,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.validate_state =#{dto.validateState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.modify_by =#{dto.modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.modify_time =systimestamp where t1.id = #{dto.id}
mapper.delete: delete from ext_interface_params_ref t1 where t1.ID in (${ids} )
delete from ext_interface_params_ref t1 where t1.interface_no =#{interfaceNo}
